page.title: 02Vennington & Vron Gate.
page.content:
{Vennington}is quite a small village. There are quite a few houses but many farms.A disused mill has been changed into a house.There is one Jersey Dairy farm but there are more beef farms in the area.Vennington has an under-ground resevoir which serves all the Westbury area. The library van passes through Vennington fortnightly.There is a Land-Drainage contractor in the area.Crops consist of silage and grain for the most part.
{Vron Gate}is a small settlement about 2 miles from Westbury. There is a small village hall, useful for Club and leisure activities; and one Public House,{The Seven Stars.} A small {Methodist chapel}is very active, with a thriving Sunday School. The farmland is mostly given to rough grazing.
